basics.name: Rulan Wu
basics.summary: Ph.D. student in Curriculum and Instruction at Texas A&M University, focusing on heritage language learning, family literacy development, and teacher education.

highlights: Aggie Teachers Trajectory - research on teacher perspectives toward literacy education
Asian Americans' Motivation And Career Exploration - research on community language learning programs
Math Literacy in Teacher Education - comparative analysis of mathematical application problems in US and Chinese textbooks
